sentences.sContent: Roy learns that his political opponents plan to disbar him for an ethical lapse, but he vows to remain a lawyer until he dies.
sentences.sContent_eng: Roy learns that his political opponents plan to disbar him for an ethical lapse, but he vows to remain a lawyer until he dies.
sentences.sCn: 罗伊了解到他的政治对手他计划夺取律师资格的伦理失效，但他发誓要留一名律师，直到他去世。

trans.tranCn: [律] 逐出法庭, 剥夺律师资格
trans.tranOther: to make a lawyer leave the legal profession
